replies.body: Does anyone know if Riot still does refunds for buying something right before it gets announced to go on sale?
They do not, thats why they put up a list at the beginning of the month saying which skins will go on sale
Only if it is with in two weeks.  If you email them it will be up to whoever responds to the email but most likely they will refund.
How is {{champion:268}} related to a bird?
Azir's model was inspired by an egyptian bird god :P
uuuuuuh his joke literally turns him into a bird
Tahm Kench on sale. You know what that means.
Blitzcrank on sale, you know what that means
At what time do these sales go live? I'm sorry for the stupid question, but I don't know timer resets for these kind of things.
I believe it is midnight PST. At least that's when it resets for me. Not sure if it goes off of PST or if it's just midnight local time.
can we have super teemo on sale plz
Super Teemo was on sale barely two months ago (april 17th), so it should be a while till it comes up again.
Put up meta mids for once omg
